name: Trash boat
description:
At the beginning you will appear in the middle of the sea. You control the ship with the arrows or WSAD. If you touch the garbage, you have to catch it. It takes a while. The garbage will disappear on its own. The aim of the game is to catch as much garbage as possible. The game ends when the sea is completely full. This game is about tactics when you have to decide where you are going to catch garbage.

Will be soon:

  • more ships,
  • upgrades,
  • mobile friendly,
  • music,
  • better graphics and animation,
  • downloadable on google play.

Created by Tomáš Mácha.

I am ready for questions, comments, advice, ideas, or help: info@trash-boat.tk.

You can also play on http://trash-boat.tk.
